author: USA TODAY, Matthew Brown, USA TODAY
title: Fact check: Black people being targeted in Guangzhou, China, over COVID-19 fears
description: Discrimination against blacks in the Chinese city of Guangzhou, including an incident at McDonald's, has sparked outrage.
content:
As the COVID-19 pandemic continues, Americans wonder if the illnesses they had earlier this year were actually a result of the novel coronavirus.
USA TODAY
The claim: A McDonalds location in China prohibited black people from entering
A sign barring black … [+8419 chars]
